titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Census of Washtenaw County, Michigan

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: Schedule 1. Inhabitants (bound in 3 v.). Part 1. Northfield, Pittsfield, Salem, Saline (township and village), Scio, Dexter village, Delhi village -- Part 2. Manchester, Chelsea village, Sylvan, Webster, York, Milan village, Mooreville, Ypsilanti township -- Part 3. Sharon, Superior

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: Schedule 3. Productions of agriculture. Ann Arbor, Augusta, Bridgewater, Dexter, Freedom, Lima, Lodi, Lyndon, Manchester, Northfield, Pittsfield, Salem, Saline, Scio, Sharon, Superior, Chelsea village, Sylvan, Webster, York, Ypsilanti, Ann Arbor city, Ypsilanti city

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: Schedule 4. Products of industry. Ann Arbor, Augusta, Bridgewater, Dexter, Freedom, Lima, Lodi, Lyndon, Manchester, Northfield, Pittsfield, Salem, Saline, Dexter village, Delhi and Scio villages, Sharon, Superior, Chelsea village, Webster, York, Ypsilanti, Ann Arbor city, Ypsilanti city

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: Schedule 5. Libraries, schools, and churches (bound with Schedule 4). Ann Arbor, Augusta, Bridgewater, Dexter, Freedom, Lima, Lodi, Lyndon, Manchester, Northfield, Pittsfield, Salem, Saline, Dexter village, Scio, Sharon, Superior, Chelsea village, Sylvan, Webster, York, Ypsilanti, Ann Arbor city, Ypsilanti city
